Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I'll leave my back to you then, sir.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: 'The launch site has been breached! HQ, we need an order!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Panicking Human Soldier', 3: "Is it an enemy attack?! But our alarm system didn't detect anything!!!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'System Voice', 3: 'Warning. An influx of Corrupted in the battle preparation area. Communication with the first gate has been cut off.'}
{2: 'System Voice', 3: 'Defense facilities activated. Closing all gates. All units, stay in position and organize defense.'}
{2: 'Panicking Human Soldier', 3: "There's no life response. It's a Corrupted attack!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cyril', 3: "Stupid rookies! Who cares if they're human or not, they're already at our gates!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: 'They are heading toward the supply shuttle! What should we do?!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'HQ, force shut down the auto-defense system.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cyril', 3: 'Hmph, looks like President has other thoughts.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Initiate shuttle launch procedure. All combat personnel, eliminate all obstacles near the launch site. Help "Dagger" take off!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Of course. Don't push yourself too hard, old man. This is gonna be a tough brawl."}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: "Hmph, you weren't even born when I served in the frontline!"}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'You got me with that... Haha, I look forward to your performance!'}
